title: Podcast 363: Is your metabolism messing up your mental health?
description:
Get $40 off your Lumen device with code DRLEAF (limited to the first 100 users!): https://lumen.me/?utm_source=blog&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=drleaf


EPISODE DESCRIPTION: In this podcast I talk to Daniel Tal Mor, the founder, and CEO of Lumen, about the importance of a healthy metabolism for optimal mental health, and how everyone can attain it!  


Read the show blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/what-your-metabolism-can-tell-you-about-your-mental-health


Sign up to Patreon to get access to bonus ad-free podcasts, exclusive downloads, live Q&As and more: https://www.patreon.com/drcarolineleaf  


OFFERS FROM OUR SPONSORS:

 -Athletic Greens: Athletic Greens is going to give you a FREE 1 year supply of immune-supporting Vitamin D AND 5 FREE travel packs with your first purchase. All you have to do is visit https://athleticgreens.com/leaf   

-Chime: Sign up takes only two minutes and doesn’t affect your credit score. Get started at https://chime.com/drleaf.  

-BiOptimizer’s Magnesium Breakthrough: For an exclusive offer for my listeners go to http://www.magbreakthrough.com/leaf and use DRLEAF10 during checkout to save 10% on your order.  


EPISODE HIGHLIGHTS: 

2:00 What Lumen is 

5:45 Why metabolism is so important 

7:20 The dangers of fad diets 

9:30 We are all unique & we all have unique health needs 

13:50 The power of community & accountability 

17:40 Lumen’s goal & vision to empower people to take their health into their own hands 

22:40 The science behind Lumen 

30:05 Metabolism & mental health  


Get my new book Cleaning up Your Mental Mess here: https://www.cleaningupyourmentalmess.com

Download my new and improved brain detox app here: https://neurocycle.app
